Title: Eggs in Abundance
Description:
<Flaps does a spin and deposits a drool-soaked note into your hand.>

$p, the Ruby Life Pools are overwhelmed with dragon eggs ready to hatch. We are excited to welcome these blessings to Azeroth, but we do not have enough whelptenders to mind them all.

Please visit me at the Lifeshrine so we may discuss a potential solution.

- Amella
ObjectivesText: Meet Amella at the Ruby Lifeshrine in the Waking Shores.
